short_summary: One (1) Junior Procurement Specialist for DQA Toronto
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Junior Procurement Specialist for DAQ Toronto

**Tender Reference Number:** cb-689-5528036

**Publication Date:** 2024-02-14

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-01T14:00:00

**Tender Status:** Expiring

**Tender Category:** SRV

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

The Department of National Defence has issued a tender for a Junior Procurement Specialist for the Director Quality Assurance (DAQ) Toronto. The successful candidate will provide logistics and supply support for government quality assurance activities. The contract is for an estimated 240 days per year, with a total duration of approximately one year, plus three (3) one-year irrevocable options.

**Security Requirements:**

* Custom SRCL
* Minimum Corporate Security Requirement: Secret
* Minimum Resource Security Requirement: Secret

**Associated Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Required Documents:**

* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders.

**Contracting Authority:**

* Name: Rogelio Orsetti
* Phone Number: (613) 715-0853
* Email: Rogelio.Orsettipetrocelli@forces.gc.ca

### Tender Notice Details

The tender notice is available in English and French on the Government Electronic Tendering System (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders). Interested vendors must Log in to ECAT or create a new profile to access the tender record. You can search for this tender by using the tender reference number: cb-689-5528036.

### Supplier Information Request

If you are interested in becoming a Qualified Supply Arrangement Holder, please contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA. The Task and Solutions Professional
